Articles.Content:
No, my legs are not worth a job.

Push this button and you get to meet the love of your life, or get sucked into another dimension, never to see anyone again. 50/50

Nah, not really into romance anyway.

Pressing the button will give you Dwarf Fortress 1.0, but all the embark locations are in evil biomes.

No, no

Push this button and every single Rocket you ever make in KSP will fly perfectly, or get a Blue Screen 50/50
No, all my rockets already fly perfectly.

Push da button.....

50% chance of guaranteed 5,000 year long super-awsome life.

50% chance of becoming immortal + homeless + sick FOREVER.

Push da button.....

50% chance of guaranteed 5,000 year long super-awsome life.

50% chance of becoming immortal + homeless + sick FOREVER.

ehh sure besides if i am sick it would probaby be something minor and it never said i would always be homeless

push the button to get a new laptop that will have a 50% chance having GLADOS installed or Wheatley installed
*You will get AIDS and WILL be homeless forever.
No. I Will Not.

Well, its just some random button floating in midair. Sure, why not.

Press the button to never be hungry again, but you also never eat again.

Sure, means more time for other things. (Now if only I could get my GF to push the button with me...)

Nobody knows what will happen if you push the button.

*pushes curiously* *flies into space*

This button will give you a Jeb, but he might have a rocket strapped to him.

I'll just move the button outside and press it there.

edit : oh yeah

50% chance nothing happens

1% chance you get a free computer

49% chance you die.

I would not press it because it is just too much risk and not enough reward.

The button will give you a free gahilumofershwartinheimerfalomarbalmpacaterminator, but you don't know what the gahilumofershwartinheimerfalomarbalmpacaterminator does.

Edited February 7, 2014 by mikeman7918

uh sure because it has terminator at the ennd

push for 50/50 chance of a good new tron movie or a bad movie that causes death by seizures

No, Ive never seen Tron and i have a few friends who are epileptic.

NASA gets the DOD budget, but half of it is spent on earth science.

Yes, we have as much (if not more) from earth as we can learn from other planets.

Push the button and the Moon will get Terraformed (made like earth)

Why not?

Press the button.

Push the button to eat Aperture Science repulsion gel and get a free portal gun.

Ahhhh, what the heck, portal guns are cool *press*

Edited February 8, 2014 by mikeman7918
Press for Pokemon in real life, but they turn the world into their own landscape and enslave humanity.
Since the button said "pointless", there is a 80% chance the button will cause nothing to happen.

Actually that was in reply to my message

Ahhhh, what the heck, portal guns are cool *press*

http://cdn1.akamai.coub.com/coub/simple/cw_timeline_pic/5ce11899565/a83547f842a5097e7bbda/ios_large_1390703519_image.jpg

For anyone who is confused, the last post that actually mattered is this one:

Press for Pokemon in real life, but they turn the world into their own landscape and enslave humanity.

Don't press.

Press the button to go to space on the space shuttle, but there is a 30% chance the challenger accident will happen again.

Don't press...

You can get 3 6x4 chocolate bars but there is a 40% chance that they are "bloom'd"

(Only parts of it)

Will you press it?

I pleed the 5th

Press, and you will be sent on a mission to Mars with a 50% chance of failing in some way.
